description: Listed Building Consent for the internal alterations including stud partition wall removals between the kitchen and living spaces to create an open plan living/kitchen/dining room, replacement of the bedroom fire door to a different position, removal of cupboards in bedroom and living area, and kitchen extract to external side wall with low profile flue to be similar in colour as existing brickwork.
